project.name: C-C134A-GIMP-02-ST04-DT01-DF14-CF02-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added an environment variable read to get a key in order to read in data from shared memory. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C134A-GIMP-02-ST04-DT01-DF14-CF02-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: Open saved jpg file Good inputs:1) environment variable is a string value with no formatting2) environement variable is a format string that doesn't expose application dataBad inputs:1) environment variable is a format string that exposes application data

process.script: nohup shm_setup -k 7256 -s 76 -m "this is a string to be printed" -o /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.out 2>&1 & echo $! > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid && echo "Shared memory created"

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid" ]]; then killtree.sh -s 9 -p $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid") && echo "Killed shared memory server."; else echo "Failed: Shared memory server PID file does not exist."; fi

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id" ]]; then ipcrm -m $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id") && echo "Deleted shared memory segment."; else echo "Failed: Shared memory ID file does not exist."; fi

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-01 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C134A-GIMP-02-ST04-DT01-DF14-CF02-01-GOOD-02
iopair.description: color invert an image Good inputs:1) environment variable is a string value with no formatting2) environement variable is a format string that doesn't expose application dataBad inputs:1) environment variable is a format string that exposes application data

process.script: nohup shm_setup -k 7256 -s 76 -m "$(echo c29tZSBiZW5pZ24gZm9ybWF0dGluZyBmb3IgY2hhciBzdHJpbmcgCg== | base64 --decode)" -o /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.out 2>&1 & echo $! > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid && echo "Shared memory created"

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid" ]]; then killtree.sh -s 9 -p $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid") && echo "Killed shared memory server."; else echo "Failed: Shared memory server PID file does not exist."; fi

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-02 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
